Type.Name: MovementStep

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MovementStep extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: An enumeration used by to decide how the cursor will move.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep BufferEnds = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move to the end of the buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep DisplayLineEnds = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move up/down lines (wrapped lines).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep DisplayLines = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move up/down lines (wrapped lines).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep HorizontalPages = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move horizontally by pages.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep LogicalPositions = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move by forward/back graphemes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep Pages = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move by pages.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep ParagraphEnds = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move to either end of a paragraph.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep Paragraphs = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move up/down paragraphs (newline-ended lines).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep VisualPositions = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move by left/right graphemes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.MovementStep Words = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The cursor will move by forward/back words.
